item.title: Notify someone with hook when you update a git working copy
item.description: Some projects have production code that runs off of a git cloned repository. There may be a case in which you want to notify others when that clone pulls. It is a pretty easy feat with gits post-merge hook. The post-merge hook will run after a merge (think git pull). All you have to do it create a project/.git/hooks/post-merge shell script and chmod +x it. Next time you pull successfully that script will run.

item.title: SyntaxHighlighter Plus Patch
item.description: Disclaimer: I did not write the bash support for syntaxhighlighter bboy.mr.freeze did and it can also be found here . All I did was take that, and modify SyntaxHighlighter Plus to take advantage of it.
